content: It's an amazing app makes knee hockey really fun but all my downloaded songs dont show up when I go to add it I cant seem to figure out how to add a goal song. I would like you to add the florida everblades horn to the tier 4 horns
replyContent:
Thanks for the review!
To upload a goal song, make sure there is an audio file (.wav or .mp3) on your device, click browse for goal song, click "select folder" on the left hand side of the browser, locate the folder the song is in, at the bottom of the screen click "allow access to", then it should be in the browser!

I do have a 0.2 second delay when pushing the horn and letting go of the horn to try to resemble pushing a real goal horn as accurate as possible, as air needs to make its way to the horn when you push the button. I'll look into fine-tuning the timing, and making sure each horn is timed properly
